Alarm.description: This resource defines the data definition for an Alarm.  An Alarm is an entity that has a latch type behavior.  It is designed to be used to persist sensor threshold crossing or to capture the momentary state of another property.
Alarm.longDescription: This resource shall represent an Alarm in a Redfish implementation.

title: #Alarm.Alarm
